Very interesting puzzle platformer. I enjoyed the no-nonsense puzzle nature of the game. Portal 2 tried to elaborate more on plot lines, but this game just drops you into a puzzle room and lets you have at it, which I really enjoyed. It isn't a very long game, but is priced accordingly and hold up well over time. Definitely recommend.

I don’t why, but I beat this game three years ago, and I just keep coming back to the game to play with its funky physics and mechanics, and just beating the campaign again! I even turned on developer commentary the second time around and beat it in two hours, but learning about the game’s development just made me more mesmerized about the game! It’s incredible!
and thus the item that would be referenced in every other game forward was born

Portal is an amazing game with even better mechanics. The portal gun and lack of fall damage can really create some amazing puzzles and really awesome moments. The story is somewhat lacking, but the game makes up for this with great puzzles and funny dialogue. If you want a more story based game with similar if not better mechanics, I would recommend buying Portal 2 after you complete this game. Overall this is a great game, 9/10.

Oyun, oyuncuların gideceği yolu değiştirmek, etrafta verilen ipuçlarıyla oyuncuyu doğru yolu bulması konusunda düşündürmek ve tahmin etmesini sağlamak üstüne tasarlanmıştır. Portal silahı, Half-Life 2'nin Yer Çekimi Silahına benzerlik göstermektedir, tek fark Portal silahı ile her durumda kendi yolunuzu çizersiniz. Portal 2 daha iyi

wonderful puzzle game

Об этой игре я слышал и раньше, но только нынче решил сыграть в нее. Слышал я и много хвалебных отзывов о ней, и могу теперь с уверенностью сказать, что они оправданны. Игра-головоломка, но с элементами экшена, которых и в боевике не часто встретишь. Особенно зацепила реализация "порталов" - это просто умопомрачительная вещь! Признаюсь, в определенные моменты мне все-таки пришлось пользоваться опытом других игроков, так сказать, ибо в прохождение некоторых комнат я реально не мог врубиться. В общем, отменная игра, мне она лично очень понравилась, и оттого я рекомендую ее и вам.
If you want the prequel to Portal 2, go on ahead, buy it. If your just looking for a good game, get Portal 2.

Технодемка, где ты тупо выполняешь задания, переходя от уровня к уровню, используя порталы. Сама по себе концепция очень интересная и увлекательная(забавно было испытывать законы физики и, используя их, проходить уровни), но кроме неё ничего и нет
Думал я сначала, как потом попал в тайную комнату, с расписанными стенами на одном из уровней, а потом эта история с кубиком.. и тут начался сюжет!
Ближе ко второй части игры он начал проявляться, а к моменту побега начался экшен с динамичной музыкой, классными ситуациями, использованиями порталов и репликами ГЛЭДОС.  
Финал понравился, и вторая часть не заставила долго ждать..
Auch in 2021 ist das Spiel einfach noch genial. Unfassbar, wie gut es gealtert ist.
Проходил ради песенки в конце игры.
Bom pra perder um tempo

Unlike most people, I played Portal 2 first and then came around to playing the first game in the series. It is necessary to the story, albeit not as polished or lengthy as the second. However, it's a great game and I love the challenges of the puzzles.

It is a quick game in comparison to Portal 2 that came out after its initial success.  I would expect someone used to puzzles to finish it start to finish in under 4 hours.  But, it is an entertaining game story wise as well as with use of the portals as part of the environment in the puzzles.  I would suggest the package with both Portal and Portal 2 with Portal as in introduction to the game.

Portal is good because everybody says it's good. Ok to be serious Portal is a great FPS puzzle game and it's perfect for people who are new to PC or FPS games in general. Luckily the puzzles in this game were all fair and  they were all easy enough for someone like me who does not usually enjoy puzzle games to enjoy it! There is a reason people love this game and are wishing for a return to this series and it certainly deserves it! 9/10

The story is a bit short, but the gameplay and story are engaging the entire time. The graphics must have been updated at some point because this does not look like a 14 year old game. Still a great game, but Portal 2 offers more value for the same price.
this is one of the most games ever made
Masterpiece

A classic that runs on my 7 year old laptop.  Haven't played this since it first came out all those years ago and, being someone who is nearly half a century old, am glad that there's no time limit, online co-op or pressure to get a move on.  A classic puzzler with a story that makes you laugh.  Have had a brilliant few hours catching up with the crazy world of Portal.
Well made, good story, one of my favorite games
